info.title: Backend.AI Proxy Coordinator API
info.description: Backend.AI Proxy Coordinator REST API specification

circuit_ids.description: Comma separated list of Circuit UUIDs.
circuit_ids.title: Circuit Ids

app.description: Name of the Backend.AI Kernel app circuit is hosting. Can be a blank string if circuit is referencing an inference app.
app.title: App

protocol.description: Protocol of the Backend.AI Kernel app.

worker.description: ID of the worker hosting the circuit.
worker.title: Worker

open_to_public.description:
Shows if the circuit is open to public.
For interactive apps, this set as true means users without authorization cookie set will also be able to access application.
For inference apps it means that API will work without authorization token passed.
open_to_public.title: Open To Public

allowed_client_ips.description: Comma separated list of CIDRs accepted as traffic source. null means the circuit is accessible anywhere.
allowed_client_ips.title: Allowed Client Ips

port.description: Occupied worker port. Only set if `frontend_mode` is `port`.
port.title: Port

subdomain.description: Occupied worker subdomain. Only set if `frontend_mode` is `subdomain`.
subdomain.title: Subdomain

endpoint_id.description: Model service's UUID. Only set if `app_mode` is inference.
endpoint_id.title: Endpoint Id

app.description: Name of the Backend.AI Kernel app circuit is hosting. Can be a blank string if circuit is referencing an inference app.
app.title: App

protocol.description: Protocol of the Backend.AI Kernel app.

worker.description: ID of the worker hosting the circuit.
worker.title: Worker

open_to_public.description:
Shows if the circuit is open to public.
For interactive apps, this set as true means users without authorization cookie set will also be able to access application.
For inference apps it means that API will work without authorization token passed.
open_to_public.title: Open To Public

allowed_client_ips.description: Comma separated list of CIDRs accepted as traffic source. null means the circuit is accessible anywhere.
allowed_client_ips.title: Allowed Client Ips

port.description: Occupied worker port. Only set if `frontend_mode` is `port`.
port.title: Port

subdomain.description: Occupied worker subdomain. Only set if `frontend_mode` is `subdomain`.
subdomain.title: Subdomain

endpoint_id.description: Model service's UUID. Only set if `app_mode` is inference.
endpoint_id.title: Endpoint Id

requests.description: Number of requests processed by this circuit.
requests.title: Requests

ttl.description: Number of seconds remaining before this circuit will be discharged due to inactivity. Can be null if `app_mode` is `interactive`.
ttl.title: Ttl

tags.description: Metadata of target model service and dependent sessions.

apps.description:
key-value pair of available applications exposed by requested endpoint.
Key should be name of the app, and value as list of host-port pairs app is bound to.
apps.title: Apps

open_to_public.description:
If set to true, AppProxy will require an API token (which can be obtained from `generate_endpoint_api_token` request)
fullfilled at request header.
open_to_public.title: Open To Public

wsproxy_host.description: Authority string (not UUID) of AppProxy worker. If not set, API will return slots of every workers.
wsproxy_host.title: Wsproxy Host

in_use.description: If set true, only returns information of occupied slots.
in_use.title: In Use

authority.description: authority string of worker. Unique across every workers joined on a single coordinator.
authority.title: Authority

available_slots.description:
Number of slots worker is capable to hold. Workers serving `subdomain` frontend have -1 as `available_circuits`.
For `port` frontend this value is number of ports exposed by the worker.
available_slots.title: Available Slots

occupied_slots.description: Number of slots occupied by circuit.
occupied_slots.title: Occupied Slots

nodes.description: Number of actual nodes claiming as same worker. Can be considered as HA set up if this value is greater than 1.
nodes.title: Nodes

authority.description: authority string of worker. Unique across every workers joined on a single coordinator.
authority.title: Authority

delete.description:
Removes circuit record from both coordinator and worker, in bulk.


**Preconditions:**
* Requires Worker token present at `X-BackendAI-Token` request header to work.

get.description:
Returns information of a circuit.


**Preconditions:**
* Requires Worker token present at `X-BackendAI-Token` request header to work.

delete.description:
Removes circuit record from both coordinator and worker.


**Preconditions:**
* Requires Worker token present at `X-BackendAI-Token` request header to work.

get.description:
Lists statical informations about given circuit.


**Preconditions:**
* Requires Worker token present at `X-BackendAI-Token` request header to work.

post.description:
Generates and returns a token which will be used as an authentication credential for
 /v2/proxy/{token}/{session}/add request.

Creates or updates an inference circuit.


**Preconditions:**
* Requires Manager token present at `X-BackendAI-Token` request header to work.

delete.description:
Deassociates inference circuit from system.


**Preconditions:**
* Requires Manager token present at `X-BackendAI-Token` request header to work.

post.description:
Creates and returns API token required for execution of model service apps hosted by AppProxy.
 This API is meant to be called from Backend.AI manager rather than model service callee itself.


**Preconditions:**
* Requires Manager token present at `X-BackendAI-Token` request header to work.

get.description:
Returns health status of coordinator.


**Preconditions:**
* Requires Manager token present at `X-BackendAI-Token` request header to work.

Deprecated: only for legacy applications. Just call `proxy` API directly.
Returns URL to AppProxy's `proxy` API handler.

Provides slot information hosted by worker mentioned.


**Preconditions:**
* Requires Worker token present at `X-BackendAI-Token` request header to work.

Lists all workers recognized by coordinator.


**Preconditions:**
* Requires Worker token present at `X-BackendAI-Token` request header to work.

put.description:
Registers worker to coordinator.


**Preconditions:**
* Requires Worker token present at `X-BackendAI-Token` request header to work.

get.description:
Returns information about worker mentioned.


**Preconditions:**
* Requires Worker token present at `X-BackendAI-Token` request header to work.

patch.description:
**Preconditions:**
* Requires Worker token present at `X-BackendAI-Token` request header to work.

delete.description:
Deassociates worker from coordinator.


**Preconditions:**
* Requires Worker token present at `X-BackendAI-Token` request header to work.

get.description:
Lists every circuits worker is currently serving.


**Preconditions:**
* Requires Worker token present at `X-BackendAI-Token` request header to work.
